item.title: Graduation Ceremony
item.dc:creator: Communications
item.description: Join us for our graduation ceremony on February 22, 2025. You can explore our campus, meet our faculty, and learn about our programs while celebrating the achievements of the graduates. We look forward to seeing you there!
item.content:encoded: Join us for our graduation ceremony on February 22, 2025. You can explore our campus, meet our faculty, and learn about our programs while celebrating the achievements of the graduates. We look forward to seeing you there!

item.title: Welcome to Our New Website!
item.dc:creator: Communications
item.description: We are excited to launch our new website! This platform will serve as a hub for information about our programs, events, and achievements. Stay tuned for updates!
item.content:encoded: We are excited to launch our new website! This platform will serve as a hub for information about our programs, events, and achievements. Stay tuned for updates!
